Nice torrent, got everything you need to play. one downpoint though is that I don't have any background music, but that's probably due to some issue on my PC (windows 7). everything else works just fine!
The music problem is that the game was designed for DirectX6 and it will probably never be fixed. The easiest way to get music is to find the soundtrack online and just listen to it while playing.
